Reviews.Review: Top IRC App. Ũbersichtlich und schnell.
Great app to connect to my favourite channel (PowerShell) on chat.eu.freenode.net.
Works really good. Hope they add a background agent so I stay logged in when minimizing. :)
Very good. I think this is just about as good as an IRC client can be on a phone, and now it event has support for secure connections!
Very short trial almost put me off but works great. Desperately needed well done creators.

Apps.App: IRC7 is the long waited IRC-client for Windows Phone 7. IRC7 uses the pieces provided by the Windows Phone 7 Mango-update to provide you the ultimate IRC-client for Windows Phone 7.
Find great wallpapers with Movie Posters. Just enter the name of the movie and you will get a high resolution poster provided by the extensive TMDb. Simple and fast to use.

What is my IP? IP Snoop answers this question. This light-weight app for Windows Phone 7 shows your current IP-address. Supporting live tiles, IP Snoop allows you to keep up-to-date about your current IP-address.
